sentences.en: Being environmentally - friendly can also wind up saving you money.
sentences.cn: 而反过来,环保也能为我们省钱.

sentences.en: Building a new factory there would be environmentally disastrous.
sentences.cn: 在那里建新工厂将严重损害环境.

sentences.en: Building the proposed new road would be environmentally damaging.
sentences.cn: 修筑那条拟建的新公路会对环境造成破坏.

sentences.en: Capabilities using rare earth compounds as environmentally friendly gasoline antiknocks were explored.
sentences.cn: 探讨了稀土化合物用作环保汽油抗爆剂的可能性.

sentences.en: Environmentally-conscious Germans are worried about the pollution the car produces.
sentences.cn: 关注环境的德国人对汽车造成的污染十分担心。

sentences.en: Green building also refer to environmentally friendly houses, factories, and offices.
sentences.cn: 绿色建筑也可以是环保的房屋 、 厂房 、 办公室.

sentences.en: He veered away from the most environmentally sound option.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了对环境保护最有利的选择方案。

sentences.en: I conclude that nuclear energy is the safest, most economical and environmentally clean.
sentences.cn: 我的结论是核能是最安全的, 也是最经济的,对环境造成的污染也是最小的.

sentences.en: More and more companies have gone "green" and started producing so-called environmentally-friendly products.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司变得“环保”起来，开始生产所谓的环境友好型产品。

sentences.en: More than just fun, future kitchens will be environmentally friendly.
sentences.cn: 除了有趣以外, 将来的厨房将更环保.

sentences.en: Our brochure is printed on environmentally-friendly paper.
sentences.cn: 我们的小册子是用环保纸张印刷的。

sentences.en: Pavement fast: no cement, sand, using environmentally - friendly plastic can be a shop.
sentences.cn: 铺装快捷: 无需水泥 、 沙子, 用环保胶一铺即可.

sentences.en: She claimed that nuclear power was the most environmentally safe form of energy.
sentences.cn: 她声称核能是最环保的能源.

sentences.en: Wood flooring not only cleans easily, but it's environmentally friendly into the bargain.
sentences.cn: 木地板不光容易打扫，而且还环保。
